      • getWarehouseProducts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getWarehouseProducts()
        This method returns a list of products from the warehouse. It retrieves the product information from the 'products' table and warehouse table and join them by productid and creates a Product object for each row retrieved. It sets the product's price, discount, name, amount, productname, description, type, productid and critical amount. It also retrieves the image of the product from the images directory and sets it to the product object.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Products A list of Product objects representing the products in the warehouse

      • getOrderData

        public java.util.ArrayList<OrderReport> getOrderData(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> monthAndYear)
        retrieve the number of orders made on each machine in a given month and year. The data is retrieved using a JOIN query on the orders and machines table, and is grouped by machine location and machine id.
        Parameters:
        monthAndYear - list containing the month and year to be used in the query
        Returns:
        ArrayList of OrderReport object containing data for each machine, or null if no data is found

      • generateOrderReport

        public void generateOrderReport(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> monthAndYear)
        method will generate and insert order reports into the orderreports table. The data is retrieved using getOrderData() method, and is inserted into the table as a new row.
        Parameters:
        monthAndYear - list containing the month and year to be used in the query

        Returns:

      • disconnectClients

        public void disconnectClients()
        Disconnects all currently logged-in clients by setting their 'isLoggedIn' status to 0 in the database.

      • importMechanism

        public java.lang.String importMechanism()
        Imports data from an external CSV file into the database. Specifically, it imports data for the 'users' table.
        Returns:
        a string indicating the status of the import process. A value of "0" means the import was successful, a value of "1" means there was an error reading the file.

      • generateReports

        public void generateReports()
        This method generates various reports for the current month and year. It generates an order report, a client report, and a monthly inventory report for each machine in each area. The order report is generated by passing the current month and year as arguments to the 'generateOrderReport' method. The client report is generated by passing the current month and year as arguments to the 'generateClientReport' method. The monthly inventory report is generated by looping through all the machine areas, getting the machine IDs for each area, and then passing the area, machine ID, current month, and year as arguments to the 'generateMonthlyInventoryReport' method.
